subject: Soccer
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Mark González scored in the 66th and 75th minutes, sending Chile to a 3-2 exhibition win and giving the United States its first five-game winless streak since 2007.
snippet: Mark González scored in the 66th and 75th minutes, sending Chile to a 3-2 exhibition win and giving the United States its first five-game winless streak since 2007.
